title: SUHU - Vegetarian Tiger - Fulllink Plaza
description: Second branch of SUHU in Haidian District, at 北京市朝阳区朝阳门外大街18号丰联广场三层. This place is situated very close to the Chaoyangmen metro station. Very large menu (identical with the Haidian place). Try the blueberry yam. Quite big and busy place inside a mall. Clean, stylish place. NOTE: Please verify the map coordinates and let happycow know!
